abstract: Karl Motey is said to have recorded telephone conversations with other technology industry executives, who are accused of tipping off hedge funds and others.
snippet: Karl Motey is said to have recorded telephone conversations with other technology industry executives, who are accused of tipping off hedge funds and others.
lead_paragraph: 7:49 p.m. | Updated A crucial cooperating witness in the most recent round of arrests stemming from the federal government’s insider trading investigation pleaded guilty this month, according to court documents unsealed on Thursday.

headline.main: Consultant Pleads Guilty in Insider Trading
